Description: Subaru agreed to pay over $6 million to settle class action litigation relating to defective infotainment systems.
Private Litigation Case Title: Udeen et al v. Subaru of America et al

Description: Subaru agreed to pay over $68 million to settle its involvement in multi-district litigation connected to the use of dangerously defective Takata Corp. air bags.
Private Litigation Case Title: In Re: Takata Airbag Products Liability Litigation
